page.title: London office
page.content:
The London office.

How do I find it?

The London office is on Shoreditch High Street opposite the Ace Hotel.  

The full address is:

Deeson, 

141-143 Shoreditch High St

London

E1 6JE

Press the 'Manifesto' buzzer to gain access, if you visit regularly you can also request a fob.

What meeting rooms are there?

These are four meeting rooms available for bookings, you'll need to ask for access to the calendars and then can invite the 'room' via Google calendar to secure it for your meeting.

How do I connect to the wifi?

Wifi access codes are pinned in the #london channel on Slack.

This information is for team members employed by Deeson Group Ltd and Deeson Publishing Ltd.
